Watch files on desktop.commandLineArgs: -p C:\Users\mgr\Desktop -l Debug -t -u C:\Users\mgr\Desktop\Success -i C:\Users\mgr\Desktop\Fail -c "C:\Program Files\ConEmu\ConEmu64.exe" -- -run echo $p

Watch directories on desktop.commandLineArgs: -p C:\Users\mgr\Desktop -d -l Debug -t -u C:\Users\mgr\Desktop\Success -i C:\Users\mgr\Desktop\Fail -c "C:\Program Files\ConEmu\ConEmu64.exe" -- -run echo $p
